title: Ghorrock teleport (tablet)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Ghorrock teleport is a magic tablet that can be broken by players to teleport to the Frozen Waste Plateau in level 45 Wilderness, providing that they have completed Desert Treasure.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Ghorrock teleport (tablet)
This article is about the teleport tablet. For the teleport spell, see Ghorrock Teleport.
Ghorrock teleport

Item ID12778

The Ghorrock teleport is a magic tablet that can be broken by players to teleport to the Frozen Waste Plateau in level 45 Wilderness, providing that they have completed Desert Treasure.

Because this tablet teleports players to the Wilderness, a warning will appear upon clicking the "Break" option on the tablet. This can be toggled by right-clicking the "Configure" option.

Players can create this item on the ancient lectern by the altar inside the Jaldraocht Pyramid with a piece of soft clay, 2 law runes, and 8 water runes, as well as level 96 Magic while being on the Ancient Magicks spellbook.

A player breaking a teleport tablet

The player does not need to have the relevant Magic level to use the tablet, which shares the same rule with all tablets and the player will not receive any experience, although making the teleport tablet does give 106 experience in Magic.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
7 October 2020
(update)

The "Break" option on the tablet is now a left-click option, and will warn players if they really wish to teleport into the Wilderness. A new right-click "Configure" option can remove and reactivate the warning at will.

30 September 2020
(update | poll)

Players can now create magic tablets of Ancient Magicks teleport spells at the lectern inside the Jaldraocht Pyramid.

23 April 2020
(update)

Ghorrock teleports now cost 10,000 points each.

28 November 2019
(update)

Six Ghorrock teleports are now given per point instead of four.

12 October 2017
(update)

The examine text was changed in order to inform players how deep in the Wilderness they will be teleported to. Previously, it was "A tablet containing a magic spell."

12 May 2016
(update | poll)

The teleport tablet was given another graphical update.

30 April 2015
(update)

The teleport tablet was given a graphical update.

25 September 2014
(update)

Ghorrock teleport tabs are now right-click break.

Because this tablet teleports players to the Wilderness, a warning will appear upon clicking the "Break" option on the tablet. This can be toggled by right-clicking the "Configure" option. Players can create this item on the [[Lectern (Ancient)|ancient lectern]] by the altar inside the [[Jaldraocht Pyramid]] with a piece of [[soft clay]], 2 [[law rune]]s, and 8 [[water rune]]s, as well as level 96 [[Magic]] while being on the [[Ancient Magicks]] spellbook. [[File:Teleport Tablet.gif|left|thumb|130px|A player breaking a teleport tablet]] The player '''does not''' need to have the relevant Magic level to use the tablet, which shares the same rule with all tablets and the player will not receive any [[experience]], although making the teleport tablet does give 106 experience in Magic. ==Creation== {{Recipe |skill1 = Magic |skill1lvl = 96 |skill1boostable = Yes |skill1exp = 106 |notes = {{plink|Ancient Magicks|pic=Ancient spellbook}} active |members = Yes |ticks = 2 |ticksnote = Auto-creating is 2, then 4 ticks. |facilities = Lectern (Ancient){{!}}Ancient lectern |mat1 = Law rune |mat2 = Water rune |mat4 = Soft clay |mat1quantity = 2 |mat2quantity = 8 |output1 = Ghorrock teleport (tablet) |output1txt = Ghorrock teleport }} ==Item sources== {{Drop sources}} ===Store locations=== {{Store locations list}} ==Changes== {{Subject changes header}} {{Subject changes |date = 7 October 2020 |update = Blowpipe Ammo Changes and Small Fixes |poll = |change = The "Break" option on the tablet is now a left-click option, and will warn players if they really wish to teleport into the Wilderness.
